Articles.Content:
I've had a new favourite these days....,

and its PUBG!

tell me if you also like it. I am a pro at it
I've been playing it for a few months, and I am terrible!  But it is very fun with friends.  I ran over a guy last night in a Dacia, too much fun!!

Hello, my name is Daf, and I'm an addict.

Seriously though, that game has a considerable potential for addicition, watch out.

I play on EU servers in the evening hours, hit me up if you want to play a few rounds.

PUBG is a Fortnite streamer, right?

(It's sarcasm NOW, but this was my true first impression months ago..)
...by the time the virtual battleground becomes reality in your homeland... it`s fun.
